output: This recipe for a delicious herbal tea is the perfect blend of sweet and spicy. Start by combining two parts lemongrass, two parts ginger, one part mint, and one part lavender in a glass bowl. Mix them together and pour the mixture into a muslin tea bag. To brew, bring one cup of water to a boil and steep the tea bag in it for five minutes. Finally, add a teaspoon of honey and enjoy a soothing cup of herbal tea.
